name: Name

terms.acceptance-of-terms: By using Kiwi, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to abide by these terms and conditions.
terms.user-registration: You must be at least 13 years old to create an account on Kiwi. When registering, you agree to provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.user-conduct: You agree to use Kiwi in a manner consistent with all applicable laws and regulations. You will not engage in any unlawful, harassing, abusive, or otherwise objectionable conduct while using the platform.
terms.content-guidelines: You are solely responsible for the content you post on Kiwi. You agree not to post content that is defamatory, infringes upon the rights of others, or is otherwise inappropriate. Kiwi reserves the right to remove any content that violates these guidelines.
terms.privacy: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information.
terms.intellectual-property: Kiwi and its content, including but not limited to logos, trademarks, and user-generated content, are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use Kiwi's content without prior written permission from the platform.
terms.termination: Kiwi reserves the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time and for any reason, without prior notice.
terms.changes-to-terms: Kiwi may revise these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. By continuing to use the platform after such changes, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.
terms.disclaimer-of-warranties: Kiwi is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
terms.limitation-of-liability: In no event shall Kiwi be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in any way connected with your use of the platform.
terms.governing-law: These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Korea, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

title: Title
no-events-explanation: Upcoming events will be shown here!
empty-error: No input provided. Please enter a value.
no-whitespace-error: Whitespace is not permitted. Please enter a valid input.
cant-invite-self-error: You cannot invite yourself. Please invite another member.
already-invited-error: You have already invited this member
delete-account-warning: Warning: Deleting your account is permanent and cannot be undone.
change-team-ownership-description: Make sure you transfer ownership to someone you trust. You will be demoted to admin role.
delete-team-warning: Warning: Deleting this team is permanent and cannot be undone.
already-joined-error: Member has already joined the team.
only-owners-error: Only owners can access team settings.
